item.title: Welcome to Pol Castellano's page!
item.description: I’m doing my PhD in Bioinformatics at University of Barcelona and my research is focused on food metabolomics In this page you can find content about Bioinformatics, Biostatistics and Metabolomics

Biography I obtained my Bachelor degree in Biology at the University of Barcelona (UB) in June 2016. In July 2017 I obtained my Master’s degree in Bioinformatics and Biostatistics at the University of Barcelona (UB) and the Open University of Catalonia (UOC). My master thesis was titled “Prediction model of response to a certain treatment in childhood obesity”. During my bachelor and master degree studies, I focused my research in the search of epigenetic and metabolomic biomarkers in Childhood obesity.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: This is an example of using the custom widget to create your own homepage section. I am a teaching instructor for the following courses at University X: CS101: An intro to computer science CS102: An intro to computer science CS103: An intro to computer science CS104: An intro to computer science CS105: An intro to computer science CS106: An intro to computer science CS107: An intro to computer science
